captions.text: I got the right to live,
We're waiting for a fight, in the woods, with no end.
And they could have it all,
We used to be in war,
And when the sun comes up,
We're waiting for a fight, in the woods, with no end.
And they could have it all,

title: ♫ "Spawn" - Minecraft Parody of Johnny Cash / NIN - Hurt

comments.author: xXColdSteel503Xx

comments.text:
Man watching this reminds me of old school HG. When after day 1.5 shit got 
real. Basically every dead player could spawn whatever they chose and could 
drop whatever, wherever. So after a day of this 99% of the map was drowned 
in lava, had 1000000 ghasts flyin around or was owned by a player with full 
diamond enchants. AND THAT was when the true survival started.﻿

comments.text:
There is alot of argument about if its right to make a parody of Johnny 
Cashs Hurt and its true in a way. Like this parody is amayzing and youre 
sound is beautiful but the original song is kind of 'dead bed song' so it 
should be honored.
Dont get me wrong! I love this song but its not like it would be the first 
one I would make a parody or expect to somepody to make one. Still loving 
this parody and you are doing good work whit doing parodies:)﻿

comments.author: Crystal Keys

comments.text:
"If I could spawn again,
A million blocks away
I would stay in the dark
They won't care anyway."

That is how I feel about school. No one at my school would care if I moved 
away to another school, or even if I died. I have no friends at school, 
just in my neighborhood, at my gifted program and around town. I wish I 
could just live a million miles away, just me, my family, and my friends.﻿
